Text: Anyone getting their rocks off to animated characters having sex needs some serious help.  We need to get out a bit more
Not to discredit either your joke or your lack of a brain. but non of this is animated or cgi. that being said i think that the makeup team did a hell of a fucking job on this.

I have personally seen a trailer to this on youtube, on YOUTUBE. This is Not CGI or computer animated, it is very finely tuned makeup artists at their finest. This is a good movie concept and also with good actors.
